title: Enigma
content:
I pay a bottle of champagne for the first one who can tell me which font is this !

W and g are specials.

Searching it for 3 days...

Thank you in advance to the community

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414062235im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0054_3933.jpg)
author: ouatch

comments.content:
Please ask here: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414062235/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
And specify the brand.

hhp

Wigrum  
 [http://www.batfoundry.com/catalogue\_9\_wigrum\_.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414062235/http:/www.batfoundry.com/catalogue_9_wigrum_.html "http://www.batfoundry.com/catalogue\_9\_wigrum\_.html")

Fugue - close but I think it's Wigrum  
 [http://www.radimpesko.com/fonts/fugue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414062235/http:/www.radimpesko.com/fonts/fugue "http://www.radimpesko.com/fonts/fugue")

As mentioned above post type IDs in [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414062235/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

Please don't do type IDs here.

hhp
